channel.title: Cant connect
channel.description:
Hey, I port forwarded my port and it says it's open. I changed ip in source and client to my no-ip, but it wont connect? Please help me...
Edit: I fixed it. If anyone needs to know how to, in the server files, put 127.0.0.1 as ip. In the players client put your no-ip. In your own client put 127.0.0.1.

item.title: Cant connect
item.dc:creator: @Nookumdip Nookumdip
item.description:
@Nookumdip wrote:

When I try to login I get an error in the server, and I cannot login.

Read full topic

item.title: Cant connect
item.dc:creator: @RochiLTD RochiLTD
item.description:
@RochiLTD wrote:

Yes neither does mine you probably have a new source change the client ip to 0.0.0.0 or 127.0.0.1 everybody else will be able to connect from the other ip accept u connect to one of them.

Read full topic

item.title: Cant connect
item.dc:creator: @Nookumdip Nookumdip
item.description:
@Nookumdip wrote:

Hey,
I port forwarded my port and it says it’s open.
I changed ip in source and client to my no-ip, but it wont connect?
Please help me…

Edit: I fixed it.
If anyone needs to know how to, in the server files, put 127.0.0.1 as ip.
In the players client put your no-ip.
In your own client put 127.0.0.1.

Read full topic
